File libsrc/libmath/Find.c

The "locate" routine from Numerical Recipes, William H. Press, 1986, page 90.

For monotonically increasing x[j], and x[0] <= findx <= x[n-1],

Locate returns the index j, such that x[j] < findx <= x[j+1].

Public Functions

Find 
 int Find(float *x,
          int n,
          double findx)
Search for array elements that bound a value. For monotonically increasing x[j], this function returns the index j, such that x[j] < findx <= x[j+1].

Parameters:
x - An array of monotonically increasing numbers.
n - The length of x.
findx - The value to search for.
